sshexmap

Class HexPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sshexmap.HexPainter

  • public class HexPainter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that does nothing but draw hexes! Right now it's somewhat closely tied to MapWidget, but if you ever need to draw hexes outside of the map you could probably use or tweak it

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      HexPainter(double hexRadius)
      Constructs a hex painter, loads all relevant images
